ASSESSMENT

  • Thorough, John (04/13/2016 10:47am CDT)

    From a renal perspective, over the last 3 years her Cr has progressively increased from 80 to 175 umol/L with a current eGFR of 32 mL/min. Her most recent protein:Cr is elevated at 201 mg/ mmol. She has noted worsening peripheral edema and despite my best efforts, her glycemic control remains suboptimal. Lastly, her renal ultrasound reveals bilateral renal atrophy with the absence of any hydronephrosis.
